name: Star Trek: New Worlds
description:
Star Trek: New Worlds is a strategy game developed by 14 Degrees East. It was originally released in 2000. Interplay Productions published the game. Star Trek: New Worlds has a Metascore of 52, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Star Trek: New Worlds on PC.
It was scored by Inon Zur.
